title: Losing Sleep
lyrics:
You know that I like it when
I'm around you again
But I don't wanna see us breaking
Breaking us down
I'm on my bedroom floor
Wrapped up in a thousand thoughts

I don't know how long I can take it

It's tearing me down



I'm done with trying

To slowly find

A way we can reconcile



'Cause I've been losing

Too much sleep for you

Feel like a fool

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time

And I can't find peace of mind

When I'm with you

What did we do

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time



I haven't slept in days

So much that I wanna say

Is weighing me down

But you don't hear me

Not hearing me out

Why did we lose so much

Of what I thought was a perfect love

Slammed your door in my face

You're kicking, kicking me out



I'm done with trying

To slowly find

A way we can reconcile



'Cause I've been losing

Too much sleep for you

Feel like a fool

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time

And I can't find peace of mind

When I'm with you

What did we do

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time



You're so hard to reach baby

I'm getting no sleep lately

I've been losing

Too much sleep for you



You're so hard to reach baby

I'm getting no sleep lately

I've been losing

Too much sleep for you



I've been losing

Too much sleep for you

Feel like a fool

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time

And I can't find peace of mind

When I'm with you

What did we do

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time



(I can't get no sleep)



I've been losing

Too much sleep for you

Feel like a fool

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time

And I can't find peace of mind

When I'm with you

What did we do

Fighting 'bout nothing

All the time



You're so hard to reach baby

I'm getting no sleep lately

I've been losing

Too much sleep for you
